body_html:
I just tried it again in an isolated test, and you're right. Core was able to resolve <symlink>/saved_model.pb to the target. It must have been something in my code that was choking on the symlink.

This code is fine as-is, sorry for the bother.

body:
I just tried it again in an isolated test, and you're right. Core _was_ able to resolve `<symlink>/saved_model.pb` to the target. It must have been something in my code that was choking on the symlink.

This code is fine as-is, sorry for the bother.
